# Clean data

## File 1

```{r, eval=FALSE}
euc_saligna_25c_cleaned_dry_weights <-

    # Select the data to be clean
    raw_dry_weights_data["dry_weight_euc_saligna_dec_25c.dat"] %>%

    # Transform list element to dataframe type
    as.data.frame(.) %>%

    # clean colnames
    `colnames<-`(str_extract(colnames(.), '\\b\\w+$')) %>%

    # Choose a interval of time
    filter_droughtbox_data(.,
                           from_start_time = "13:19:10",
                           to_end_time = "13:20:50")  
```
## Plot cleaned data

```{r, plot_dry_weights_cleaned_data_25c, eval=FALSE}
plot_strains_weights([sp_code]_25c_cleaned_dry_weights, show_tare_group = FALSE)
```
